attributes.action: desolve the house from the 18th May 2009, call a general election by the end of May, and staert prosecution proceedings against all MP's that have been found to be fraudulantly claiming expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The serious fraud squad and CPS should ba allowed free access an un restrained actions agaist all MP's found to be claiming expenses in a fraudulant manner

rejection.details:
A petition calling for a general election already exists on the site:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/

Prosecuting people is outside the remit of Government. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes and present that evidence to the Crown Prosecution Service, who decide whether to prosecute, and carry out a prosecution if one goes ahead.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
